zh.components.TriggerWay.5425713-1: 适用于设备数据或行为满足触发条件时，执行指定的动作
zh.components.TriggerWay.5425713-3: 适用于第三方平台向物联网平台下发指令控制设备
zh.components.TriggerWay.5425713-5: 适用于定期执行固定任务

en.components.TriggerWay.5425713-1: Applicable to executing specified actions when device data or behavior meets triggering conditions
en.components.TriggerWay.5425713-3: Applicable to third-party platforms issuing instructions to IoT platforms to control devices
en.components.TriggerWay.5425713-5: Suitable for regularly executing fixed tasks
